thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, good service - Review
thread.title_full: Good location, good service - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Junda2
title: Good location, good service - Review
text: We liked the location, fast check in/out, friendly staff. It is 25 mins walk to London Eye, 10 mins to the Globe, 5 mins to Southwark tube station. The beds were a bit too soft. But the room was well isolated from outside and we did not hear any noise, good sleep overall. The breakfast staff are great. Generally, we were happy to stay in this hotel.
